page.title: 02A Walk through the grid
page.content: We started the walk at{Burton {Primary School}in Campbell Road. The school is surrounded by a housing estate. We went out of the main gate and turned onto Salisbury Road. On the left hand side as we walked were some fields with crops in them. To our right was Burton Hall and the housing estate. A small stream runs underneath the road and behind Burton Hall. Burton Hall was being converted into a Public House. As we came to the centre of the Village we passed the Infant school and the village green to the right. Burton Parish Hall and St. Luke's Church were opposite. We moved on, eventually leaving the village. The road went through a farm where cows were kept. They obviously moved the cows daily across the road as there was mud on the road.
